Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout.
William Contreras stole home to help the Milwaukee Brewers beat the San Francisco Giants 6-0.
Garrett Mitchell homered for the Brewers.
Jackson Chourio drove in two runs.
Civale worked seven innings for his longest outing of the season.
Ashby pitched two perfect innings, striking out three.
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers Manager Pat Murphy praised the team's resilience and competitiveness.
Giants Manager Bob Melvin acknowledged the team's poor performance and praised Civale's pitching.
